roleset.name: re-record and image
roleset.note: REIMAGE-V NOTES: Bsed on data in Clinical Notes corpus. Framed by Anwen Feb 2011. (from reimage.101-v)
REIMAGING-N NOTES: Based on data in temprel and stratified corpora. Comparison to reimage.101. Framed by Katie (from reimaging.01-n)

example.name: Both Args
example.text: Dr. Mikhail reimaged the patient's infected foot.

example.name: Just Arg1
example.text: Following surgery, [the patient's wrist]-1 was reimaged *-1
Should reimaging of the disease show it has metasticised,
